p: In this study, ingredient and antibacterial activities of six EOs, including Artemisia dracunculus (ADEO), Anethum graveolens (AGEO), Citrus limon (CLEO), Citrus sinensis (CSEO), Cinnamomum zeylanicum (CZEO), and Zingiber officinale (ZOEO) were investigated. Then for the first time, their IC 50s were calculated.
